MarketKing FAQs

Find out what people frequently ask about MarketKing.

  • General

  • Pre-Purchase

  • Support

  • License

  • Payment & Pricing

  • Technical

General

1. What is MarketKing?

MarketKing is a Multi Vendor and Multi Purpose eCommerce Software with Apps that allow you to run and manage many eCommerce businesses at the same time. 

2. Can I Customize the MarketKing solution after purchase?

Of course, you can. Check out our customization services & discuss your requirements with us.

3. How can I get the latest version of MarketKing?

Once you purchase MarketKing, you’ll get lifetime FREE updates! You’ll get automatic notifications from CodeCanyon when we update MarketKing. Download the latest version from the CodeCanyon dashboard and upload it to the system update of MarketKing. 

4. Can I purchase MarketKing for my clients?

Yes, you can. Please note: You can only purchase one license at a time for one client. If you want to serve multiple clients, you must purchase multiple licenses. 

Pre-purchase

1. Which MarketKing license should I choose?

Currently, two licenses are available for MarketKing in CodeCanyon- regular & extended licenses. You can visit our pricing to learn more about the differences between them. 

2. Can you set up my MarketKing eCommerce Solution?

Sure! You can explore our installation page & choose the installation service that suits your needs. 

3. Is there any documentation available for MarketKing?

Yes. Find the detailed documentation of MarketKing here.

4. How many language & payment methods can I integrate?

There are no limitations. You can integrate unlimited language & payment methods as per your choice.

Support

1. How to reach your support?

To contact our support team, please create a ticket here. 

2. Do I have to pay for a support ticket?

No. Our support is completely FREE of cost. 

3. Do you have a support policy?

We do. Please read our support policy here.

4. Do you provide technical support after purchase?

Yes. We provide 6 months of technical support per CodeCanyon's support policy. 

License

1. Can I purchase a license for a commercial project?

Indeed, you can. 

2. Can I use one license for multiple domains?

No. If you want to use multiple domains, you must purchase multiple licenses. 

3. How can I get multiple licenses?

To get multiple licenses, you need to purchase MarketKing multiple times from CodeCanyon. 

4. How many language & payment methods can I integrate?

There are no limitations. You can integrate unlimited language & payment methods as per your choice.

Payment & Pricing

1. Can I change my installation plan?

Please contact our support team if you need to adjust your installation plan. 

2. I don’t know how to install the MarketKing system. Can you help?

Please visit our installation page & learn which package you need for installation.

3. Do you have a refund policy?

We do. Read our refund policy here. 

Technical

1. Why do I automatically get logged out when I test the MarketKing demo?

Our demo database resets itself automatically every 1-hour interval. That’s why you’re facing this issue. Please log in again using the demo credentials. 

2. What are pagination settings?

Pagination settings are where the admin determines how many elements will be available on a single page. For example, on the product category page, the admin wants to see 10 products on a single page. If there are more than 10 products, others will automatically be displayed on the 2nd page.  

3. What’s the difference between product categories and attributes?

Product categories serve as a high-level grouping and navigation structure for arranging products, whilst attributes provide particular features and traits that distinguish and describe individual products inside those categories. 

4. What is the importance of ReCaptcha?

ReCaptcha is an important security measure to protect websites and online platforms from automated bots and spam.

5. What’s the difference between react website & flutter website?

Both React and Flutter website features the same functionalities of MarketKing. However, React website is more modern, beautiful and faster than the Flutter website.

Join The Revolutionary Transformation in The eCommerce Industry

Start Now!
